explanation: [0-0] On a small path with grass in the background, a man in blue shorts stands next to a motorcycle, holding a cigarette and a thin string.

[0-5] The man threads the thin string through the filter of the cigarette, carefully adjusting it to the center. He then holds the cigarette and string near the motorcycle's fuel tank cap, using his other hand to open the fuel tank cap.
